comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Oral history with Roosevelt Sands Sr (audio and transcript; he talks about the playing baseball among other topics): milemarkers.fiu.edu/interviews/sands/ The county health department clinic in Key West is named for Roosevelt Sands.

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Thanks again! Great resource for additional information on Mr. Sands. Bonus points for finding an interview where he mentions baseball!
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 66151649@N02
comment._content: Is this a Negro League team?

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/66151649@N02] Yes, the Key West Coconuts were registered with the Negro Baseball League.
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
